mapper.select: SELECT C.REVIEW_NO, C.MEMBER_NO, C.RESER_NO, C.REVIEW_TITLE, C.REVIEW_CONTENT, C.REVIEW_CREATED, C.REVIEW_REV_NO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC) AS RNC, REVIEW_NO, MEMBER_NO, RESER_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_CREATED, REVIEW_REV_NO FROM REVIEW) C WHERE C.RNC BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
mapper.insert:
SELECT REVIEW_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEW_NO, MEMBER_NO, RESER_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_CREATED, REVIEW_REV_NO) VALUES (#{reviewNo}, MEMBER_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, RESER_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, SYSDATE, #{reviewRevNo})
INSERT INTO RE_IMAGE (RE_IMAGE_NO, REVIEW_NO, RE_IMAGE_PATH, RE_IMAGE_SAVED, RE_IMAGE_ORIGIN) VALUES (RE_IMAGE_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{reviewNo}, #{reImagePath}, #{reImageSaved}, #{reImageOrigin})
